entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 11:43 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
